summary.overview: The CCDL transaction provides credit card detail lookup functionality, allowing users to search for and view detailed credit card information by account ID or card number. The system validates user credentials, provides menu navigation, and displays comprehensive card details including cardholder information, expiration dates, and account status.
business_functions: User Authentication - Validate user credentials against security file and determine access level
Menu Navigation - Display appropriate menu options based on user type (admin or regular user)
Credit Card Search - Accept and validate account ID or card number search criteria
Input Validation - Ensure search criteria are properly formatted and at least one field is provided
Card Data Retrieval - Retrieve detailed credit card information from card database
Card Details Display - Present comprehensive card information including cardholder name, expiration date, and status
Error Handling - Display appropriate messages for invalid inputs or records not found
Session Management - Handle program flow and return control to calling programs

CCDL.program_overview: Credit card detail lookup and display processor
Main menu interface for regular users
Administrative menu interface for admin users

datasource_summary.name: User Security File (USRSEC)
datasource_summary.function: User security file used to authenticate user credentials by reading user ID and password information

datasource_summary.name: Credit Card Data File (CARDDAT)
datasource_summary.function: Read credit card records by card number to retrieve card details including embossed name, expiration date, and status

datasource_summary.name: Credit Card Alternate Index File (CARDAIX)
datasource_summary.function: Alternate index file for accessing card records by account ID (referenced but not actively used in current logic)
